name: Me
text: Got it? Don't ever call me Chief again...

name: Me
text: (By all appearances, they don't seem very strong, but they are still demons. Seeing as I don't know the extent of their power, I can't let my guard down.)

name: Me
text: (I want to get this over with before it turns into a commotion. We had the window breaking ruckus from just a few moments ago, and now there's also some kind of floral scentー)

name: Shizuru
text: Hold it right there!!!
A beautiful woman with long, blonde, fluttering hair appeared gallantlyー

name: Me
text: Shizuru!?
But what this hostess was wearing was unmistakably a Taima-Suit.

name: Me
text: What are you wearing!!!?

name: Hebiko
text: Oh? Kosaka-sensei. Good evening!

name: Kosaka Shizuru
text: Evening, Hebiko-chan☆

name: Me
text: Eeeehh!? Hebiko, do you know her!? And wait, you were a Taimanin!?

name: Hebiko
text: What are you talking about, Fuma-chan. That's Kosaka Shizuru-sensei, the English teacher.
Hebiko said casually.

name: Me
text: Kosaka Shizuru... senseeeeei!!?

name: Shizuru
text: It's because you're always skipping English class, Fuma-kun~

name: Me
text: Ugh...
I couldn't deny that at all. More importantly, that meant that I had shown something like that to my English teacher...

name: Shizuru
text: Ehehe.

name: Me
text: So you had your fun with me even though you knew exactly who I was? What kind of teacher does that.

name: Shizuru
text: So sorry. But thanks to you attracting all the attention of the local yakuza gangsters, I've made good progress with my mission.

name: Me
text: Oooh, oooh, so that's what's going on... Thanks to you, I was chased the whole night and almost died.

name: Hebiko
text: Kosaka-sensei is an expert in undercover missions! If she's here, then that means that there's something going on in this black market district.

name: Hebiko
text: Besides, coming here wearing a Taima-Suit... Does that mean the investigation is in full swing, sensei?

name: Shizuru
text: Yes. I found out that those two little squirts are the key to an incident around here. So I was trailing them.

name: Me
text: These brats are...?
When I looked down at the brats in question, they seemed to have completely lost interest and were fooling around, scribbling on the ground with chalk.

name: Lilim & Minasaki
text:
Lilim: I think I drew him quite well though?
Minasaki: Hmmーdwaw Chief's face dumber.

name: Me
text: (Don't tell me that haphazard scribble is supposed to look like me...)

name: Lilim & Minasaki
text:
Lilim: Draw some nose hair!
Minasaki: He's so scwuffy! Kyahahaha!!
Were these dumbasses really the key to an incident that even the Taimanin were getting involved in...?
One hour later.
We were walking through a tunnel deep inside the industrial district of Maesaki City.

name: Me
text: Hey, doesn't this lead into the mountains? Are you guys playing a trick on us and taking us the wrong way...?

name: Minasaki
text: N-No! Don't be such a meanie!

name: Me
text: You're one to talk after getting me into all kinds of trouble...

name: Hebiko
text: Up ahead there's a factory belonging to Kurowadami Pharmaceuticals, right?

name: Me
text: Kurowadami Pharmaceuticals... You mean that big company that even does TV commercials? They have facilities here in the countryside?

name: Hebiko
text: They built a large complex as part of the Regional Development Policy. It was on the local news.

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan, you need to check the recent news as well, not just those old documents!

name: Me
text: Y-Yeah... So in this factory of Kurowadami Pharmaceuticals there's a "queen" somewhere?

name: Minasaki
text: There is! My Yatagarasu power is never mistaken!
So this Minasaki or whatever she was called, apparently was an incarnation of Yatagarasu, meaning she could sense the location of anything she had seen once... or something like that.

name: Lilim
text: Not trusting in Mina-chan's power... You're quite arrogant for someone so useless, Fuma!
Just as I thought, "They finally stopped calling me Chief," this time they were using my name without adding "-san" or anything.

name: Me
text: I mean, it only came to this because you sold faulty goods to a pharmaceutical company...

name: Lilim & Minasaki
text:
Lilim: Shut up!
Minasaki: Dumb-dumb!
Their noisy voices echoed through the tunnel.

name: Me
text: Sheesh...
According to what Shizuru-sensei had told me along the way, the whole story went something like this.

name: Shizuru
text: Recently, cases of creatures from the Devildom being illegally brought in and sold are increasing... which I think you already knew.

name: Me
text: Yeah.
Like the Blood Dog from earlier. It wasn't unusual for fanatics who were into rare creatures to buy them at ridiculously high prices.

name: Shizuru
text: The ones who are really after those creatures from the Devildom are not individuals but corporations.

name: Shizuru
text: Creatures that don't exist in the human world are a treasure trove for new discoveries.

name: Shizuru
text: They're like trees that grow money. Especially for corporations that are developing biotechnologies... such as pharmaceutical companies.

name: Me
text: I see.
And those two little devils had also heard about this.
They had happened upon some wasp-like demonic beasts called "Devildomian Wasps."
They had planned to sell them to a pharmaceutical company to get a big payday.

name: Me
text: Devildomian Wasps... They're said to be wasps from the human world that evolved some distinctive characteristics in the Devildom.

name: Me
text: With queens and workers, their social structure was also similar to that of normal wasps.

name: Me
text: The workers follow the Wasp Queen's orders. Utilizing this characteristic...

name: Me
text: If someone caught the queen and implanted a control device, then they would be able to freely manipulate the whole swarm...

name: Shizuru
text: Perfect answer. Please study English with the same diligence♪

name: Lilim & Minasaki
text:
Lilim: Study!
Minasaki: Stupid Fuma!!

name: Me
text: Ugh... S-So you guys sold this swarm of Devildomian Wasps and the control device to the company as a set?

name: Lilim
text: Yeah! Aren't we smart?

name: Minasaki
text: We made a pwetty good deal, mister.

name: Me
text: Then how did it turn into this kind of situation!?

name: Lilim
text: Th-That's because...

name: Minasaki
text: There was a tiiiiny pwoblem...

name: Shizuru
text: The device for controlling the queen simply broke down.

name: Lilim
text: I guess repurposing the rice cooker I bought at the flea market didn't work out after all...
In any case, due to that, the uncontrolled Devildomian Wasps went on a rampage.
They had escaped from the facility and gone wild in the nearby city night after night, going around causing damage by breaking windows.

name: Hebiko
text: So that's what the "poltergeist" that Heberybody saw was.

name: Shizuru
text: For now the situation is confined to the black market district, but if it spread to proper society, it would be huge news.

name: Shizuru
text: So that's why the pharmaceutical company panicked and had the local yakuza try to catch the Devildomian Wasps while also searching for those two, since they were the cause of everything.

name: Me
text: And it was me who got caught up in all of this...
In addition, the government had gotten suspicious of the pharmaceutical company and asked the Taimanin to investigate.
First, Shizuru had disguised herself as a hostess and tried to get information from the company's employees who came to spend time in the city.

name: Shizuru
text: A man who is feeling generous has loose purse strings and loose lips.

name: Shizuru
text: Collusion with local yakuza, illegal purchasing of Devildomian creatures... I was able to get a lot of information.
If she could obtain proof that the pharmaceutical company had illegally purchased those Devildomian Wasps and was doing research on them, her mission would be complete.
And in the process, she had learned about those two little devils and turned the local yakuza gangsters' attention toward me, so she could observe them while keeping them safe.

name: Me
text: But why were you two trying to catch the Devildomian Wasps?

name: Minasaki
text: It's "after-sales service"!

name: Lilim
text: Besides, the only reason there hasn't been any big damage done yet is because the queen is still young!

name: Lilim
text: While the queen is young, the Devildomian Wasps gather nectar from Devildomian orchids or lilies...
Orchids. Now I understood why those wasps had attacked the red-light district. They were after the flowers in those establishments.

name: Minasaki
text: But if the queen gwows up, it will start eating meat...

name: Me
text: Are you serious... It'll be pretty bad if she becomes carnivorous in the middle of the city.

name: Shizuru
text: Since the queen doesn't stray far from the nest, she's most likely still in the forest that the pharmaceutical company is using for experiments, exactly as those girls said.

name: Shizuru
text: But if those two entered the facility, they would be caught because people are on the lookout for them, you know?

name: Shizuru
text: That's why they were searching for the worker wasps that were buzzing around the city instead.

name: Lilim
text: But there was no end to them...

name: Minasaki
text: If we get wid of the queen though, the worker wasps will also die! And we have Chief here now♪

name: Me
text: I told you to stop calling me Chief... But at least you're trying to take responsibility. You might not be as bad as I thought.

name: Lilim
text: Of course! Don't lump us in with you, stupid Fuma!

name: Minasaki
text: Yeah, yeah! Stupid Fuma! Nose hair Fuma!

name: Me
text: Hnggghhh...
I felt something hot boiling deep within my stomach.

name: Me
text: You damn brats... Using secret torturing skills that have been passed down from Taimanin to Taimanin since 1,500 years ago I'll fillet you alive...

name: Lilim & Minasaki
text: Huagh!?

name: Hebiko
text: F-F-Fuma-chan, calm down!

name: Shizuru
text: Even Taimanin don't have that kind of secret skill!

name: Me
text: Huaargh... ehrm... a-alright, for now the queen is first priority...
